events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund immediately. The product is not what I expected.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to receiving the incorrect item in the shipment.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect order.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll do my best to help you get a refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake?
Here is my order number: 123456789. I attached the photo of the item I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund and you can keep the incorrect item or return it if you prefer.
Thank you for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate the option to keep the item or return it.
Your refund has been processed. You should see the amount returned to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We just wanted to check in that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been closed following confirmed receipt of the refund and no further issues reported.
